@CodingItWrong @jlengstorf @Netlify The "Production" part of that deploy label is referring to the build happening on the branch that you have set as your "production" branch. This might be more apparent if the you have branch deploys happening too. (Like in this image) https://t.co/Axl0J50ZbO
